Helloo! I am Priya, an MS student in Computer Engineering at Virginia Tech, advised by Prof. Ming Jin. My research interests include Reinforcement Learning, Large Language Models, Optimization and AI safety. I am currently a Graduate Research Assistant in the ROLE Lab at Virginia Tech, where I work on inducing moral reasoning in AI agents to enable alignment and safety.
